Give your business the chance it deserves, right from day one.

Hi, I'm Alex. I’m a freelance web designer and full stack developer living on Kangaroo Island based in Daw Park, South Australia. I've been working with Australian businesses big and small, for the better part of 10 years. I love staying on the cutting edge of design and technology, while delivering the outcomes you need to push you and your business forward.

I'm a full stack creator. In other words, I'm a one stop shop for everything you need done on the web. Read more about my background

Web Experiences

There's no arguing these days about the importance of an excellent web experience for your business. I think mine is pretty great! Let me work with you to represent your business the best we can.

E-Commerce

Your products need the online shopfront that they deserve. Let's build something special. Websites don't care if you pay them a wage.. and they always show up on time.

Business Solutions

Computers are really irritating. Lucky for you, there's an easier way! The world has moved past spreadsheets, and maybe it's time for you to as well. I've got a real knack for creating online solutions for businesses to increase productivity, and reduce headaches. All in that 'cloud' thing that people keep talking about.

AB Performance Marine

CO-FOUNDER BRANDING WOOCOMMERCE

AB Performance Marine is a locally run and owned business servicing the high performance sailors of South Australia. With a clean slate and a long leash, we started with logo design and the development of a clean and modern visual style.

We handled everything from producing the product images, through the website design, and developing the e-commerce platform complete with payment gateway.

Prices

ANGULAR MULTI-PLATFORM

Prices is a multi-platform application developed for a local SA company, which helps it's salespeople keep updated with the most current information. Paper price lists have been replaced by iPads, increasing convenience and ensuring that updates are available instantly to everybody that needs them.

A desktop component of the application allows management to easily make changes and push them into the field with little effort, and less waste.

Helbig Memorials

ZURB FOUNDATION RESPONSIVE

Helbig Memorials came to me with an already established brand, and we worked together to create a fully responsive website which provided an excellent user experience while staying true to their existing material.

Image rich product pages showcased their excellent products and workmanship, and an easy to use contact form created a huge increase in online leads.
